[++Currencies++]

[Max Credits]
088916F0 3B9AC9FF

[Max Battle Points]
08896F64 3B9AC9FF

[Max Navarro Points]
08921F4C 3B9AC9FF
{Turn on before using MeTaMo and leave on at least until the streetpass shop screen}

[--]

[++Equipped Part Weight Adjsutment++]

[Leader's equipped Parts Reinforced]
A8892418 FF0000FF
DA000000 08892418
F4000000 000002F0
DF000001 00020000
A8892632 0000FFFF
DA000000 08892632
F4000000 00000014
DF000001 00020000
